header.headline: Reach a new audience of global collectors

intro.title: Collector Introductions
intro.subtitle: Build relationships with new and seasoned collectors around the world

intro.title: Brand Exposure
intro.subtitle: Promote your works and artists to the largest online art audience

intro.title: 0% Commission
intro.subtitle: Faciliate sales in one place with ease—Artsy takes no commission

sections.title: Connect with the right collectors in minutes
sections.content: Simply list your inventory on Artsy and qualified collectors will start receiving personalized notifications about your gallery. The Artsy network becomes your network—engaged, informed, and ready to inquire.

sections.title: Grow your gallery presence on a global scale
stats: Top ranking art marketplace on Google

sections.title: Access everything you need to sell in one place
sections.content: Manage inquiries, review collector profiles, process payments and more—all in one place with Artsy’s easy-to-use content management system and messaging tools.

sections.title: Carry your gallery with you, wherever you go
folio: Artsy Folio syncs with your inventory seamlessly
Create albums to curate and share groups of works
Send one-touch emails with complete work details

testimonials.content: Artsy has increasingly brought us inquiries and introduced us to qualified collectors worldwide, resulting in substantial sales. They contribute to our gallery program significantly.

sections.title: Join the leading marketplace for art & design
sections.content: Learn more about Artsy’s all-in-one offering for galleries to expand your global reach and drive online sales
